title: Bug 124066: 'Insert Chart' not translated in Chinese context menu
description: In the context menu, 'Insert Chart' is not translated into Chinese.
OB: When right-clicking in the layout to bring up the context menu, the 'Insert Chart' option is not translated into Chinese.
EB: Expected behavior: The 'Insert Chart' option in the context menu should be translated into Chinese.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a report in a Chinese environment.
